macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Stock Market Edges Below Records as Tech Stocks Lead
items.summary: The S&P 500 fell 0.1% to 6,940.01, remaining just below its record set on Monday, while the Dow Jones fell 0.2% to 49,359.33 and the Nasdaq declined 0.1% to 23,515.39. Technology stocks, including Broadcom (up 2.5%) and Micron Technology (up 7.8%), provided the strongest support.

items.title: Treasury Yields Rise Amid Fed Rate Expectations
items.summary: The 10-year Treasury yield rose to 4.23% from 4.17%, while the 2-year yield climbed to 3.60% from 3.57%, reflecting market expectations ahead of the Fed's policy meeting in two weeks.

items.title: Mixed Bank Earnings Drive Sector Volatility
items.summary: PNC Financial jumped 3.8% after beating fourth-quarter targets, while Regions Financial fell 2.6% after missing forecasts, reflecting mixed results from regional banks following larger peers' earnings reports.

items.title: Labor Market Shows Signs of Cooling
items.summary: JOLTS data revealed a sharp drop in job openings signaling cooling labor demand, though ADP reported a modest rebound in private-sector hiring and the ISM Services PMI surprised to the upside.

items.title: Gold Prices Decline Despite January Gains
items.summary: Gold prices fell 0.6% but remain up more than 5% for January, continuing volatility as investors weigh economic and geopolitical uncertainty.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: DUSK Surges 39% as Top Gainer in 24-Hour Crypto Market Update
items.summary: DUSK leads altcoin gains with a 39.25% increase, followed by SLP at 14.94%, while Bitcoin dips 0.11% to $95,323.86. Ethereum and other major coins feature in Binance's latest market snapshot.

items.title: Evernorth, XRP Treasury Firm, Plans Nasdaq IPO in 2026 Wave
items.summary: An XRP-holding firm, Evernorth with 388 million XRP tokens, will list on Nasdaq, joining Kraken, Consensys, Ledger, and others in a surge of crypto IPOs. Ripple confirms no immediate IPO plans.

items.title: Monero Plunges 12% Daily Amid Calm Bitcoin at $95K
items.summary: Monero (XMR) drops 12% in the last day, while Bitcoin holds steady above $95,000 with no major movements over the past 12 hours.

items.title: Jefferies Cuts Bitcoin from Portfolio Over Quantum Computing Risks
items.summary: Jefferies' Christopher Wood predicts Bitcoin peaked at $126K and removes it from model portfolio due to cryptographically relevant quantum computers threatening Bitcoin's cryptography. Gold gains favor amid bear market.

items.title: India's Crypto Sector Seeks Regulatory Clarity and Tax Relief in Budget 2026
items.summary: Ahead of Budget 2026, industry leaders from ZebPay, WazirX, CoinDCX, and Binance urge relief from 1% TDS and 30% VDA tax, plus clearer rules to boost liquidity and innovation.

items.title: Crypto Leaders Split as US Senate Delays Clarity Act Vote
items.summary: Prominent crypto figures divide over the Senate's last-minute delay of a vote on landmark crypto legislation, the Clarity Act.

items.title: BlockDAG Faces Scandal with Unpaid Sponsorships and Missing Funds
items.summary: BlockDAG embroiled in controversy over unpaid multi-million sponsorships to football clubs, breached contracts, unpaid employees, raising questions on $442M investor funds.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Gartner Forecasts Global AI Spending to Reach $2.52 Trillion in 2026
items.summary: Gartner projects worldwide AI expenditure will hit $2.52 trillion this year, up 44% from 2025, driven by infrastructure investments rising 49% to $1.37 trillion. The growth highlights AI's integration into enterprise systems, with services and software also seeing major increases.

items.title: AI Demand Sparks Potential Nuclear Power Renaissance, UN Reports
items.summary: Rising AI data center electricity needs, equivalent to hundreds of thousands of households, may drive a new era of nuclear power, as discussed at IAEA meeting. Countries like the US, Russia, and China lead in AI-nuclear intersections amid projections of data centers consuming 20% of advanced economy power by 2030.

items.title: Box Launches AI-Powered Box Extract for Workflow Automation
items.summary: Box introduced Box Extract, an AI feature that extracts metadata from unstructured documents like contracts, streamlining data processing and decision-making. This reflects growing AI integration in software development amid infrastructure demands from platforms like Runpod.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Tops Nintendo Switch eShop Charts
items.summary: Animal Crossing: New Horizons has surged to the top of the Nintendo Switch eShop charts for the week of January 17, 2026, boosted by its major 3.0 update. Other top games include Wizard101 at #2 and Stardew Valley at #3.

items.title: New Turn-Based RPGs Released on January 17, 2026
items.summary: Several new turn-based RPGs are now available, including The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon, Archon Soul: Prologue, Primus Numen (Demo), and Deep Fringe (Early Access). These titles offer fresh gameplay for RPG enthusiasts.

items.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Market Experiences Buyouts Surge
items.summary: A new Yu-Gi-Oh! Market Watch video highlights significant buyouts in the trading card game market as of January 17, 2026, discussing current trends and impacts.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Apple Acquires Gemini Integration
items.summary: Apple has secured Gemini, marking a significant move in the company's AI strategy and competitive positioning in the tech industry.

items.title: Massive Verizon Outage Affects 1.5 Million Customers
items.summary: Verizon experienced a major 10-hour service outage across the U.S., affecting millions of customers. The company is offering $20 account credits to affected customers.

items.title: OnePlus CEO Faces Trouble
items.summary: OnePlus' CEO is dealing with unspecified issues, according to recent tech news reports.

items.title: Trump Administration Proposes $15B Power Generation Plan for Tech Companies
items.summary: The Trump administration is requesting that major tech companies pay for $15 billion in new power generation capacity to support data center expansion in the PJM Interconnection region covering 13 states.
